E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 6/3/1993
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Julio Machado



Date: Thursday, 6/12/1993
Subject: Progress of Justin Thompson
Dear Sir,
Justin Thompson has nothing more to prove at AA Huntsville Stars!
He has an ERA of 3.84 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Regards,
Will Clark

Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 7/21/1993
Subject: Dennis Powell healing process
Dennis Powell is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
